title: Ethereal Square Mangalsutra with American Diamonds
materials: accented with sparkling American Diamonds. Features traditional black beads known as 'Nalla Pusalu'. Superior polish for long-lasting shine and durability.
features: This unique mangalsutra features a contemporary square pendant design, adorned with meticulously set American Diamonds. The pendant's geometric shape and intricate setting provide a modern twist to a traditional symbol. The 'Nalla Pusalu' (black beads) are carefully strung for optimal elegance.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for a loved one. Blends seamlessly with both traditional and modern attire. Ideal for the modern Telugu woman.
description: A contemporary take on the traditional Mangalsutra, showcasing a unique square design with dazzling American Diamonds. The combination of traditional 'Nalla Pusalu' and modern styling makes this piece incredibly versatile. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear, while still making a statement. Affordable luxury without compromising on style or quality.
